CustomField.formula: IMAGE("/resource/" + $Setup.Logger_Settings__c.Namespace__c + "pharos_ds/pharos_ds/icons/category/" + CASE( Category__c, "Error", "error.svg", "Warning", "warning.svg", "Debug", "bug.svg", "Event", "events.svg", "Apex", "apex.svg", "Flow", "flow.svg", "Integration", "apex_plugin.svg", "Process Builder", "all.svg", "Email-to-Case", "case_email.svg", "Web-to-Case", "case.svg", "Web-to-Lead", "lead.svg", "Pharos Error", "pharos.svg", "help.svg") , TEXT(Category__c), 16, 16)
CustomField.label: Category Icon
